list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an animal or plant) living or growing in the natural environment; not domesticated or cultivated.
(of a place or region) uninhabited, uncultivated, or inhospitable.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một vùng đất hoang dã rộng rãi

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: wild parties were never her scene
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các bên hoang dã chưa bao giờ là cảnh của cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: not based on sound reasoning or probability.
(of a playing card) deemed to have any value, suit, color, or other property in a game at the discretion of the player holding it.
a natural state or uncultivated or uninhabited region.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: kiwis are virtually extinct in the wild
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Kiwis hầu như tuyệt chủng trong tự nhiên
